adept.common

Class Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.Argument

  • public class Argument
extends HltContent
    The Class Argument, which contains one or more Chunk objects along with their associated probabilities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BoundedList<Pair<Chunk,Float>> argumentDistribution
      Map containing the chunks that back up this argument, along with associated confidences.
      private IType argumentType
      The argument type.
      private List<IType> attributes
      The associated attributes.
      private float confidence
      Overall confidence of this argument instance.
      private Map<KBEntity,Float> kbArgumentDistribution
      Map containing the KB level entities or relations that an instance of this class resolves to, and associated confidences.

        Gets the best argument.
